reviewText: The trailers on this blu ray weren't really that great.  I found myself forwarding a lot.  The trailers on the 42nd street forever series were WAY better than this one.
Really cool group of trailers in this presentation.  I was finding myself tracking down some of the movies here on Amazon to purchase.  Great job Alamo!  Please do a part two!

Ok I have watched tons of these trailer collection DVDs and this one is my favorite. Plus you can get it in blu ray format. Top notch collection features my favorite trailers for infra man, stunt rock, black samurai, the list goes on and on. Plus the special features are great including commentary on each trailer that will make you laugh . Also a great behind the seens look at the Alamo film archive. And great interview with joe Dante on making trailers back in the day. I hope a part two is in the works buy now!

This is a great selection of classic B grade movie trailers.  Each one of the trailers seem to have some wear&tear quality to them,but since this was put out by Drafthouse Films I guess they wanted a Grindhouse touch done to them. Either way the trailers are all fun to watch.
